channel.title: Data on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Data on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Generating sample data
item.description: Application development using Cloudant as the database, for me, starts with data design. Having carefully considered how your application’s data should be modelled in JSON we may turn to the querying and indexing required: How do my queries perform with 10k, 1m or 10m documents? How long does it take for a new batch of data to be indexed? Is it better to use a Cloudant MapReduce or Cloudant Search index to solve a particular problem?
